channel.title: RuneDevo
channel.description:
Hello People! I'd like you to spare some time and look into this with more detail.
I'm the proud owner of RuneDevo And I'd like to share a little bit of information with you. So, you'd might consider joining.
Some basic information; We're a RuneScape Server Community, No.. We don't have a server. We provide you with help and information. We provide you with fun, and entertainment.
We're currently working on adding the following things;
* ChatBox * Custom smilies. ✔ * Homepage. * Adding A Logo. ✔ * Adding An Arcade * Adding Crowns. * Adding more Boards. ✔ * Enforcing NEW rules. * Server Status Checker * Sever advertisement. * Affiliates * Donation Area * Staff area * Special members area. (Donation Members.) * IRC * New Themes * Ranks; I.e; Gfx Staff, Moderation Team; Administration team..And so on. ✔
We're Currently looking for the following team;
* Moderation Team * Administration Team * Graphics Designers + Team * Technical Team * Sectional Moderation Team ✔ * Head Moderation Team Member * Head administration Team Member. ✔ * ChatBox Team * IRC Team * Server Status Team
If you'd like to apply for any of these jobs then please contact myself by using the Private Message. And supply myself with information on why you want the job. And your experiences.
If you'd like to register, then please do. The url is *

Hello People! I’d like you to spare some time and look into this with more detail.
